value:
The Order of Heroes doesn't fight for
money—or even merely for honor.
Only to save people.$k$pVery odd. I can't even begin to
relate to that kind of thinking.

You're curious...about my world?
Tell me how it would benefit me to
share those details with you?

If your tactics fail, it's us that fall on
the battlefield. Not you. So please
ask if you need tactical advice.

Not that's it's anyone's business,
but in my world, I'm among those
called the Branded.$k$pThat means I was condemned
more or less at birth to be hated
and shunned. So, there it is.

I've been scouring the history
books of this world. Oh, I have
scant interest in history itself.$k$pI am only searching for any
information that will prove useful
to guide our tactics here.

I've come to deliver greetings from
$Nf.$k$pNow I'll be on my way.

Fortune twists in the wind, and
today it blows my way.

Any increase to my abilities
is most welcome.

Fortune twists in the wind, and
today it blows elsewhere.

Now, may increasing my strength
work to your advantage.

Hmm. My name? I am the mage
Soren. Now, I have a question
for you. Is Ike here?

...and yes, that concludes my
analysis of the abilities of Heroes
from other worlds.$k$pAs you can now fully understand,
they would make dangerous foes
if they weren't our allies.$k$pAnd furthermore... Excuse me?
I sense your attention drifting
away, $Nu.$k$pFor goodness sake, you are
sometimes so vexing to me that
I can hardly—$k$pOh, never mind. But you shouldn't
get the wrong idea.$k$pI don't care a whit about anything
but getting back home. Being here
is only temporary for me.$k$pOh, you wonder why I haven't
left of my own accord then?!
It's because you...you...$k$pI mean, it's because staying lets
me sneak into other worlds and
learn our enemies' secrets.$k$pThat's useful to me. But if I can
continue to be useful to you...?$k$pThen I am happy to say that we
can consider it mutually
beneficial.
はっ！
Pointless
うああっ！
I miscalculated...
Are you ready to die?
I dispose of my enemies.
Out of my way.
Are we done here?
No...
Hmp
You're the tactician for this group? Oh, no... It's nothing.
I'll take my leave unless you have a specific request of me.
I am a mercenary. Guided by self-interest. Above bonds and attachments.
Ike is much more than a leader. No one could compare to him.
When Ike isn't feeling well, most would never notice that his left eye twitches.
No matter who I may be...I have a duty.
Helping you is to our mutual advantage. That is all.
OK.
Let's see...
Very well.
